text:
Having multiple plots per figure may look better when running the examples interactively but it makes the narrative documentation a lot more obscure.

For example:
- the [Smoothing](http://nilearn.github.io/building_blocks/manipulating_mr_images.html#smoothing) section has both the smoothed EPI and a p-values plot.
- the [Selecting features](http://nilearn.github.io/building_blocks/manipulating_mr_images.html#selecting-features) section has again the smoothed EPI and the p-values plot.

That also means that the numbering of the pngs in the rst will have to be changed accordingly. Remember to regenerate the doc to make sure everything looks fine.
